dict.acceptation: 锁住；着火；[棒球]当接球手；
迷惑人的；令人容易上当的；引人注目的；令人感兴趣的；

sent.orig: The school adopt CATCH in order to change lifestyle of the school children's family.
sent.trans: 该学校采纳了CATCH是为了改变学校学生家庭的生活方式。

sent.orig: The CATCH school children also teaches their family how to live healthily.
sent.trans: CATCH学校学生也教会了他们的家庭如何健康地生活。

sent.orig: The school applied CATCH to the school children's parents.
sent.trans: 该学校将CATCH应用到学生家长身上。

sent.orig: No other conversions are allowed when looking for a matching catch.
sent.trans: 在查找匹配catch的时候，不允许其他转换。

sent.orig: My friend's hands are catching the baseball. Catch, catch, catch.
sent.trans: 我的朋友的手正在抓棒球。抓，抓，抓。
